views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 8 - 12

Extension of the ShutterSound and ScreenShot, Photos app.

[Settings]
Silent Shutter Sound: By to ON, turn off the shutter sound of the camera and the screen shot.

If the camera shutter sound does not sound even if the setting is OFF, please reboot the device.

Also can On / Off by Flipswitch or CCSupport.

[Screen Shot]
Share Mode: when taking a screen shot, to display the share menu.

Tap "Upload to Imgur" to copy the URL to the clipboard after uploading.

Screen Shot Flash: when taking a screen shot, flash appears on the screen.

Hide Status Bar: Cut out the status bar and shoot a screenshot.

Save the Screen Shot in JPG: Saves in JPG file of the small capacity of the screen shot. In the case of OFF, save the PNG file.

[Photos]
No Recently Deleted: By to ON, without taking into Recently Deleted, Delete the files directly.
(iOS 9 or later is Photos.app only worked.)

Configure options from Settings app.
